column1: Highlights: Powerful WiFi: Up to 300 Mbps speeds on 2.4 GHz for fast wireless connections.*
High-Speed GPON Access: Deliver maximum data rates of up to 2.488 Gbps downstream and 1.244 Gbps upstream**.
XPON Dual Modes: Supports GPON and EPON dual modes for flexible fiber internet access.
Smooth CATV: CATV port offers a convenient CATV connection.

column3: and WPA3 combine to ensure personalized and safer online experiences.

column1: Flexible Wired Connctivity: A gigabit Ethernet LAN port and the fast Ethernet LAN port ensure flexible wired internet access.
Remote Management: OMCI (ONT Management and Control Interface)

Content Notes: *Maximum wireless signal rates are the physical rates derived from IEEE Standard 802.11 specifications. Actual wireless data throughput and wireless coverage are not guaranteed and will vary as a result of network conditions
**Use of WPA3 requires clients to also support the corresponding feature.
§Multi-gig or 1000 Mbps internet speeds require compatible service plans and equipment.
Actual network speed may be limited by the rate of the product's Ethernet WAN or LAN port
column2: the rate supported by the network cable
